description: This dish, known as “menemen” in Turkey, is spicy and utterly moreish. Add more chilli if you like it hot.
keywords: Egg dishes,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Turkish Eggs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat and cook the onion for 5 minutes. Add the capsicums to the pan and cook for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, place the yoghurt, mint, and garlic in a small serving bowl and stir together. Cover and set aside.
Add the chilli, tomatoes, and sugar to the frying pan, season well, and cook for 10 minutes.
Make 4 hollows in the tomato mixture and crack an egg into each. Cover the pan and cook for 5-10 minutes, or until the eggs are cooked to your liking.
Sprinkle the dish with the coriander and serve with the herb and garlic yoghurt.
